This is a paragraph\note{And this is a simple note}. And some more of
the same paragraph and blah blah blah and here's\note{a footnote that
crosses a line boundary} some more.\note{This footnote is itself a
whole document with:

    some code in it
      indented line
        a more indented line
    unindented line

and some more stuff

  and a blockquote

And a list:

  @ foo

  @ bar

  @ baz

} and the rest of the original paragraph.
